I showed Akane and Inori to the bath, since they\nwanted to rinse off.%K%P
As I went back to the living room, I thought about\nthe day's accomplishments.%K%P
'Akane's dancing was phenomenal.'%K%P
She didn't show any fatigue after all that, so there\nshould be no concern regarding her ability to\nsing and dance.%K%P
At this rate, Akane showed so much potential that it\nseemed like only a matter of time before she'd become\na real idol.%K%P
'But...it sure is quiet.'%K%P
I got used to being alone until fairly recently.\nBut now it's the norm for Akane and Inori\nto be here.%K%P
'That might be a good thing.'%K%P
Tsubaki used to be lively with tenants,\nmuch like it is now.%K%P
If things stay this way, I wouldn't have\nany complaints.%K%P
'I need to thank you both.'%K%P
'About what?'%K%P
'Because of you two, Tsubaki Apartments\nis getting its liveliness back.'%K%P
I turned around and answered Inori who\nwas behind me.%K%P
But when I turned around...%K%P
'What?!'%K%P
'Wh-What's the matter?\nWhy did you cry out loud like that?'%K%P
'That's for me to ask, Inori!\nWhy are you looking like that?!'%K%P
'Why aren't you wearing your clothes?!'%K%P
When I turned around, Inori was in a single\nbath towel.%K%P
'Well, it's because I just got out of the bath.'%K%P
'That doesn't really answer my question.'%K%P
'Th-There's an unavoidable circumstance\nregarding this...'%K%P
When Inori bashfully twisted around, her big chest\nlooked like it'd overflow.%K%P
I couldn't help but remember the incident\nwhen I accidentally felt her breasts and\nswallowed my breath.%K%P
'I-I don't know what that circumstance is,\nbut will you please put on your clothes?'%K%P
'Actually...'%K%P
'My clothes got muddy when I fell earlier, so I had\nto wash them. I didn't want to make the house dirty.'%K%P
Of course Inori was being conscientious.%K%P
'Then why don't you go to your room to get\na change of clothes?'%K%P
'Well, this is really hard to say, but...'%K%P
'I don't have a change of clothes.'%K%P
Don't have clothes...?%K%P
'Um, what do you mean by that?'%K%P
I could tell I was straining my face at\nInori's words.%K%P
'I actually only have...one set of clothes.'%K%P
'Are you kidding me...?'%K%P
'I'm sorry...'%K%P
Oh, man.%K%P
I noticed that she wore the same outfit every day,\nbut didn't think it was the same set.%K%P
'H-How did you get away with it all this time?'%K%P
'I would wash them after taking a bath every night.'%K%P
That implied she was only in her underwear in her\nroom while her clothes dried.%K%P
'A-Anyway, I'll try to find something you\ncan wear, so just hang tight.'%K%P
'Are you sure?'%K%P
'Yes, it'd be better for me.'%K%P
I needed to handle this before Maika returned,\nI couldn't let her see this.%K%P
'Is that so? Then, I'll happily accept the off--'%K%P
'I'm back!'%K%P
'What?!'%K%P
Th-This is the worst.%K%P
Why did Maika have to come back from school\nat the worst timing ever?%K%P
Maika's approaching footsteps sounded like a death\nsentence coming.%K%P
'Oh, it's so hot. Did I forget to chill the tea?\nHuh?'%K%P
It's over.%K%P
'Sho... What the heck are you doing?'%K%P
'Th-There's a reason behind this...'%K%P
'Sure, of course.\nHow do you explain being alone in a room\nwith a girl who's only wearing a towel?'%K%P
'W-Well, it's actually my fault.\nI was really bad at it so I dirtied my clothes.'%K%P
'We moved around and sweat a lot,\nso that's why I took a bath.'%K%P
'Inori?! Are you saying that on purpose?!'%K%P
'Hmm... Your clothes got dirty and you sweat a lot.\nWh-What the heck were you two doing?!'%K%P
'You're mistaken! Maika, don't make any weird\nassumptions!'%K%P
'Wh-What assumptions?!'%K%P
'Hey Sho. I'm done with the bath.'%K%P
'Good timing. Akane, will you tell Maika\nwhat we did...today...?'%K%P
'Hey, hey. I don't have any clothes.\nWill you lend me some?'%K%P
'Akane, you too?!'%K%P
When I looked over for rescue, there stood Akane,\nonly wearing a bath towel.%K%P
'Akane and Inori, you both don't have a\nchange of clothes?!'%K%P
After I got to explain, she looked at them in shock.%K%P
Turns out, they'd been washing their only outfit\nevery night.%K%P
'You both got away with it until now,\nbut you're gonna need more clothes.'%K%P
With so much physical movement involved,\nchanging clothes was a must.%K%P
'It's true. You're in trouble with just one set.\nEspecially with Sho here.'%K%P
Maika glared at me with the most reproachful eyes.%K%P
'Fortunately there's still time to go buy clothes.\nI'll go for them since they definitely can't.'%K%P
They both had to borrow and change into Maika's\nclothes.%K%P
'I'm headed to the shopping street,\nso will you stay at home, Sho?'%K%P
'No, I'm going with you.'%K%P
'Come again?'%K%P
'Why do you look so surprised? You'll need someone\nto help you carry all those clothes.'%K%P
'Well, if you're okay with it, by all means.\nI'm gonna go get ready,\nso be prepared to go, okay?'%K%P
'Yup, got it.'%K%P
After Maika left the living room, I headed for my\nroom to get ready.%K%P
'Hmm... I can't make up my mind.'%K%P
We were in a women's clothing store located on the\ncorner of the shopping street.%K%P
The shopping street was one of the liveliest places\nin Kannagi.%K%P
There are department stores, resturants, cafes, and\nall kinds of shops and places here.%K%P
Maika looked serious, comparing multiple outfits.%K%P
'Yup... I think this will suit her.\nSho, what do you think?'%K%P
'Yeah, I think it'll look good.'%K%P
'But this one might look pretty good too.\nWhat do you think?'%K%P
Maika knew how to pick the designs that would\nbring out Akane and Inori's character.%K%P
Honestly, I thought all of them would look good,\nbut it's probably different from a girl's perspective.%K%P
'I think it's fine?'%K%P
'Come on... Why do you seem so uncomfortable?'%K%P
'Uh.'%K%P
I was at a loss for words when Maika pointed\nthat out.%K%P
I tagged along to carry the clothes,\nbut I should've known I'd be\nstuck in the women's clothing section.%K%P
As a man, I felt pretty embarrassed there.%K%P
'You stick out more when you look around\nall weird like that.'%K%P
'I do know that.'%K%P
In any case, I don't think I could ever get used\nto this discomfort.%K%P
'Hey Maika, let me stand closer to you.'%K%P
'What?! Wh-What do you mean by closer?!'%K%P
'Thought it would look more natural\nif we acted like a couple.'%K%P
'C-Couple?! You're such an idiot!\nJust act normal, will you?!'%K%P
'But see, take a look around us.'%K%P
I saw a few couples around us linking arms\nand picking out clothes.%K%P
'I would be nervous if I was with Akane or Inori,\nbut I'm more comfortable with you, Maika.'%K%P
'What do you mean by that?'%K%P
'It means I trust you.\nWe used to link arms as kids,\nremember?'%K%P
'How many years ago was that...?'%K%P
'Not convinced?'%K%P
'Ugh, just stand close to me.\nI'm fine as long as we don't link arms!'%K%P
'I appreciate it, thanks.'%K%P
I stood right next to Maika and looked at the\noutfit she was holding.%K%P
'Hey! Y-Your face is too close!'%K%P
'I can see better this way.\nAnyway, this is the outfit you chose for Inori?'%K%P
'Nice. But how about this one?'%K%P
'Y-Yeah? Then this is the first set.'%K%P
'The first set?\nHow many sets are you\nthinking of buying?'%K%P
'Well, I'd like to have two or three sets myself.\nThey also need comfy indoor clothes too.'%K%P
'You're buying that much?'%K%P
I assumed she was only picking out one outfit\nfor them.%K%P
'You put in a lot of thought for each outfit too.'%K%P
'Of course! We're girls, we can't slack off.\nIt has to be cute.'%K%P
'Plus, even if they do look good in everything,\nI have to pick out the cutest ones.\nMy reputation's on the line here.'%K%P
'I guess so.'%K%P
'All right! let's go check that section over there.'%K%P
Maika marched through the store to continue\nher search.%K%P
'H-Hey! Wait for me!'%K%P
While I chased down Maika, who was rummaging through\npiles of clothes, an accessory caught my eye.%K%P
'This...would look good on Maika.'%K%P
It wasn't part of our initial objective, but an\naccessory wouldn't hurt.%K%P
After we finished our purchase of carefully chosen\noutfits and underwear, the sun was already setting.%K%P
'You bought a lot.'%K%P
'Really? I tried to keep it at the bare minimum.'%K%P
'Sure...'%K%P
This was the bare minimum?\nHow much did she usually buy?%K%P
'If a girl's shopping for clothes,\nit usually takes up the whole day.\nI tried to be quick since it was an emergency.'%K%P
Using up a whole day to shop for clothes?\nA girl's commitment to fashion can\nreally be something.%K%P
Certainly different from me.\nI tend to prioritize functionality\nover design.%K%P
'We haven't gone shopping together in a while.\nIt was fun.'%K%P
'R-Really?'%K%P
'Yup. I feel at ease with you, Maika.'%K%P
'M-Me too... Um... *Mumble*'%K%P
'Hmm? Did you say something?'%K%P
'N-Never mind!'%K%P
'Are you sure? All right then,\nwanna go again?'%K%P
'Sho, are you saying that you want to\nspend time with me?'%K%P
'Only if you want to.'%K%P
'S-Sure, I can go out with you from\nt-time to time?'%K%P
'Cool, then let's do this again.'%K%P
'Okay...'%K%P
We proceeded to walk in silence for a little while.%K%P
Even in silence, I felt a pleasant air flowing\nbetween Maika and I.%K%P
'Oh yeah. I have something for you.'%K%P
'For me?'%K%P
'Yeah, it's this.'%K%P
I handed a hair pin to Maika.%K%P
'Hmm? Is this for me?'%K%P
'I've inconvenienced you by having Akane and\nInori stay at the apartments.'%K%P
Maika's eyes were coming and going from my face\nto the hair pin in my hand.%K%P
'Um, are you sure I can have it?'%K%P
'Of course. I bought it for you.'%K%P
'You...bought it for me...'%K%P
'I'm...really, really happy.\nThanks Sho.'%K%P
'S-Sure. I'm glad you like it.'%K%P
I wasn't able to directly look at Maika\nwho was smiling and holding the pin near her chest.\nI scratched my face to hide myself.%K%P
'I wasn't expecting a gift from you.\nSince you've been all about Akane\nand Inori recently.'%K%P
'That's...true.'%K%P
I was about to deny Maika's remark,\nbut when I thought about the past couple days,\nI sure was devoted to them.%K%P
'But even then, you still thought of me.'%K%P
'Of course, you're my dearest childhood friend.\nI'll never leave you.'%K%P
I knew we hadn't been spending much time together,\nbut I never intended to neglect her.%K%P
'Your dearest childhood friend, huh?\nSho, why are you so active with Akane and Inori?'%K%P
'It's because I want to protect them.\nI want to protect Tsubaki Apartments\nand save Akane since getting to know her.'%K%P
'I don't want to see Tsubaki go, especially after\neverything it's done for me.'%K%P
'I know, but what's happening\nto the apartments is inevitable.\nDon't be bound by it.'%K%P
'I'm not. I'm just doing what I want.'%K%P
'Ugh, you're always so stubborn when it comes\nto things like this.'%K%P
'Is that wrong?'%K%P
'Nope. That's why I--'%K%P
She stopped herself and bashfully looked the\nother way.%K%P
'All right. If you're gonna say that,\nI'll support you as much as I can.'%K%P
'Don't think this is all about you.\nI'm doing it for Akane and Inori too.'%K%P
'I know that.'%K%P
'If it doesn't work out, we'll just have to close it.\nDo what you can, but don't go overboard.'%K%P
You can count on me.%K%P
I'll rehabilitate Akane and save\nTsubaki Apartments no matter what.%K%P
I felt grateful for her generous words as we headed\nback home.%K%P
